boardgame.name: Stalingrad Pocket 2nd Edition: The Wehrmacht_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Greatest Disaster
boardgame.description: Stalingrad Pocket 2nd Edition - The Wehrmacht's Greatest Disaster, covers the Soviet counteroffensive and the German operations to hold the pincers apart and (if that fails) to relieve the Stalingrad pocket. Soviet play requires the use of a ponderous and fragile weapon of great size (the Red Army of 1942). German play requires sabre-like use of mobile reserves in hit and run attacks._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;History: (from the back of the box:)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The German Wehrmacht stands at the pinnacle of its last season of blitzkrieg. Embattled German troops hold most of the city of Stalingrad _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;shy; but the flanks are covered with less dependable Axis allied units. Opposing these flanks are the shock troops of the 1942 Soviet winter counteroffensive. They are poised to encircle Stalingrad and turn the tide of the war._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Game: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2nd Edition SP: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is the second edition of Stalingrad Pocket, winner of the 1992 CSR Award for Best WW2 Game. It includes a reworked map and Order of Battle (utilizing Enemy at the Gates, the 1994 CSR Best WW2 Game award winner). It also applies the series rules version 1.6 used in its sister games Yom Kippur and Ardennes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;'Stalingrad Pocket 2nd Edition adds the following features to make play even more interesting:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Reserves_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Determined Attacks and Defenses_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Air Power_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Artillery Barrage attacks_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Limited use of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;dead unit count_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; victory conditions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Features_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;nbsp;:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Easy to learn and use game system. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Dynamic and Fluid situation _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Balance of Military and Political Victory Conditions required to win _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Fast and Furious Action _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Player Skill is highly rewarded _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Three Major Scenarios _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game Scale:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game Turn: 2 Days_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Hex: 3.4 miles / 5.5 Km_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Units: Battalion to Division_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game Inventory:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One 22 x 34_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; full color map_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Two dual-side printed countersheets (560 1/2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; counters)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One 8-page SCS system rulebook_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One 16-page Stalingrad Pocket II specific rulebook_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Two 6-sided dice_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Solitaire Playability: High_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Complexity Level: Low_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players: 1 or more_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Playing Time: 3-15 hours_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

*** With every sale we donate a percentage to the Veterans Support Foundation (including this sale). *** Wargame Depot has donated over $7,500 to this wonderful cause thanks, largely, to the wonderful Boardgamegeek community. Thank you so much for your continued support of Wargame Depot which has allowed us to give generously to the VSF. Mint, in shrink copy available. No dings, no dents, or anything wrong with the game. Non-smoking environment and kept in a humidity-controlled location. $10 shipping to US - write me for a quote to the rest of the world. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m the owner of Wargame Depot so a purchase from me will always be packed professionally and I can accept Paypal, MO/Check, or MC/Visa/Discover/AMEX. And if you want this game plus anything else that I am selling on BGG, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll of course be happy to add other items on in order to save you on shipping! North Carolina residents pay 7% sales tax. Cheers, Jason PS: We have many Osprey books in stock not listed on BGG. The prices are well under publisher rates; if you are interested in them, please let me know!
